00012 #include <Qt>
00013 #include <QLabel>
00014 #include <QPixmap>
00015 #include <QPushButton>
00016 #include <QLineEdit>
00017 #include <QDialogButtonBox>
00018 #include <QGridLayout>
00019 
00020 #include "stkinputkey.h"
00021 
00022 StkInputKey::StkInputKey(const QPixmap & pixmap, const QString & text, QWidget *parent) :
00023     StkWidget(parent)
00024 {
00025     // create widgets
00026     // main icon
00027     mIcon = new QLabel(this);
00028     mIcon->setPixmap(pixmap);
00029     // main text message
00030     mText = new QLabel(text, this);
00031     // input key line edit
00032     mEditKey = new QLineEdit(this);
00033     mEditKey->setMaxLength(1);
00034     mEditKey->setAlignment(Qt::AlignHCenter);
00035     // back button
00036     mBackButton = new QPushButton("Back",this);
00037     // ok button box
00038     mOkBox = new QDialogButtonBox(QDialogButtonBox::Ok,Qt::Horizontal,this);
00039 
00040     // layout widgets
00041     // grid layout 4x2
00042     QGridLayout *grid = new QGridLayout(this);
00043     // main icon topleft
00044     grid->addWidget(mIcon,0,0,Qt::AlignLeft);
00045     // main text message middle left
00046     grid->addWidget(mText,1,0,1,2,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00047     // input key line edit middle left
00048     grid->addWidget(mEditKey,2,0,1,2,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00049     // ok button box bottom left
00050     grid->addWidget(mOkBox,3,0,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00051     // back button bottom right
00052     grid->addWidget(mBackButton,3,1,Qt::AlignRight);
00053 
00054     // connect signals
00055     connect(mBackButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SIGNAL(goBack()));
00056     connect(mOkBox, SIGNAL(accepted()), this, SLOT(keyEntered()));
00057 }
00058 
00059 StkInputKey::~StkInputKey()
00060 {
00061     close();
00062     delete mText;
00063     delete mIcon;
00064     delete mEditKey;
00065     delete mBackButton;
00066     delete mOkBox;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void StkInputKey::keyEntered() {
00070     emit textEntered(mEditKey->text());
00071 }
